nodes.text: Special Ops: The Jedi Weapon Master

Special Ops: The Jedi Weapons Master was an article published in Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Gamer 9, which was released on March 1, 2002. It was written by Owen K.C. Stephens and J.D. Wiker and illustrated by Jeremy Jarvis. It provided players of Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game with a class archetype for playing a Jedi Weapon Master character across any era.
